headline: The companies that could be falling behind in the AI race
summary: As more tech companies accelerate into investing in artificial intelligence and their own AI infrastructure, Moor Insights & Strategy founder, CEO, and chief analyst Patrick Moorhead and Futurum CEO Daniel Newman debate the companies that are positioned to be the biggest laggards in AI space. Also catch Daniel Newman and Patrick Moorhead weigh in on whether bubbles are forming in the AI trade and the main driver behind the latest round of AI deals. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: The companies that could be falling behind in the AI race
content.description:
As more tech companies accelerate into investing in artificial intelligence and their own AI infrastructure, Moor Insights & Strategy founder, CEO, and chief analyst Patrick Moorhead and Futurum CEO Daniel Newman debate the companies that are positioned to be the biggest laggards in AI space.

Also catch Daniel Newman and Patrick Moorhead weigh in on whether bubbles are forming in the AI trade and the main driver behind the latest round of AI deals.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Market Domination.
